PoolCreated(address,address,uint256,uint.details: emitted when a pool is created

params.BrandVotingEndTime: unix timestamp for when the brand voting period is over
params.CampaignEndtime: unix timestamp for when the campaign is over
params.FanVotingEndTime: unix timestamp for when the fan voting period is over
params.PoolId: the id this pool is stored under in poolList*
params.PoolOwner: the address of the pool owner
params.SubmissionEndTime: unix timestamp for when the submission period is over

createPool(string,uint256,address,addres.details: Allows caller to create a custom brand pool, as long as they are verified, and have approved the contract to spend 0.1 Link  TODO add require checks to make sure inputs are logical*

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
